bill_title: revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2009.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2009. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That section 6 of chapter 27 of the 2008 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF GAME, FISH AND PARKS (5) Parks and Recreation Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$921,804" and insert $1,078,186" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 2. That section 7 of chapter 27 of the 2008 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL SERVICES (3) Medical and Adult Services Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$215,380,541" and insert "$216,242,937" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$408,133,484" and insert "$409,760,217" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 3. That section 14 of chapter 27 of the 2008 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF MILITARY AND VETERANS' AFFAIRS (5) State Veterans' Home Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$852,587" and insert "$923,051" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 4. That chapter 27 of the 2008 Session Laws be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Section 38. The state treasurer shall transfer to the state general fund one hundred fifty-six thousand, three hundred eighty-two dollars ($156,382) from the Custer State Park improvement fund to make the bond payment for Custer State Park improvements. Section 5. Funds appropriated by this Act which are unspent at the end of fiscal year 2009 may be carried over to fiscal year 2010. Section 6. This Act is effective June 29, 2009.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2009. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That section 6 of chapter 27 of the 2008 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF GAME, FISH AND PARKS (5) Parks and Recreation Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$921,804" and insert "$1,078,186" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 2. That section 13 of chapter 27 of the 2008 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: (1) Regents Central Office Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$34,935,943" and insert "$36,365,943" Adjust all totals accordingly. (5) South Dakota State University Proper Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$51,907,708" and insert "$53,412,086" Adjust all totals accordingly. (7) Agriculture Experiment Station Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$5,601,541" and insert "$5,874,556" Adjust all totals accordingly. (11) Dakota State University Personal Services, Other Funds, delete "$7,948,306" and insert "$8,708,306" Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$8,506,760" and insert "$9,546,760" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 3. That section 14 of chapter 27 of the 2008 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF MILITARY AND VETERANS' AFFAIRS (5) State Veterans' Home Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$852,587" and insert "$923,051" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 4. That chapter 27 of the 2008 Session Laws be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Section 38. The state treasurer shall transfer to the state general fund one hundred fifty-six thousand, three hundred eighty-two dollars ($156,382) from the Custer State Park bond redemption fund to make the bond payment for Custer State Park improvements. Section 5. Funds appropriated by this Act which are unspent at the end of fiscal year 2009 may be carried over to fiscal year 2010. Section 6. This Act is effective June 29, 2009.
